name: Jennifer Konikowski
tagline: works in Ruby, teaches Python, loves coding
body:
# Who
Former industrial engineer turned Python developer turned Rails developer
# What
Works mostly on OS X, sometimes Ubuntu. Codes in Python and Ruby.
# When
First CS class in 2004, started learning Python in 2010.
# Where
Atlanta from 2005 to 2012, happily in Somerville since November 2012.
# Why
Founder and organizer of PyLadies Boston, an organization dedicated to bringing more women into the open-source community in Boston.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
